jhave.client
Class InputGenerator

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              jhave.client.InputGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener
public class InputGenerator
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

Modifications by Andrew Jungwirth and TLN to allow XML-defined input generators based on input_panel.dtd

Author:
Andrew Jungwirth, TLN
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

showInputGenerator

public int showInputGenerator(java.awt.Component parent,
                              jhave.Algorithm algorithm)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Displays a dialog used ot get information from the user.

Parameters:
parent - component that the dialog is modal to.
algorithm - algorithm that needs input.
Returns:
int option that was choosen by the user (cancel or ok).
Throws:
java.io.IOException - an error occured downloadint the input generator script.

createDialog

protected javax.swing.JDialog createDialog(java.awt.Component parent,
                                           java.lang.String title,
                                           boolean modal)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
Creates the dialog that is displayed.

Parameters:
parent - parent of the dialog.
title - displayed in the title bar.
modal - if the dialog is modal.
Returns:
JDialog the dialog that contains the components for gathering input generator information.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - an error occured loading the input generator script.

Builds the JPanel containing the buttons.

getInputGenerator

public static final java.net.URL getInputGenerator(jhave.Algorithm algorithm,
                                                   ClientProperties clientProperties)
Given an algorithm it returns the URL of the algorithms InputGenerator script. If the algorithm does not use an input generator then null is returned.

Parameters:
algorithm - algorithm to find to find input generator for.
clientProperties - connection settings - used to get webroot.
Returns:
URL location of algorithms input generator script.
